original_text: As for a person who stirs up division, after warning him once and then twice, have nothing more to do with him,
korean_text: 이단에 속한 사람을 한두 번 훈계한 후에 멀리하라

sentences.original_text: As for a person who stirs up division,
after warning him once and then twice,
sentences.korean_translation: 한 번, 그리고 두 번 경고한 후에,

sentences.original_text: have nothing more to do with him,
